analyzed: 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol de ltar mnyam par bstan te zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi 'du shes 'gog pa'i shes pa ste /
translated: This is the knowledge that stops the conception of the world.

original: de ltar shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: de ltar shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis so //
translated: The characteristics of knowing this are the twelve aspects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten kun tu ston pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten kun tu ston pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom teaches the thus-gone ones the world.

original: 'jig rten bstan pa la gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la yang de skad byas zhes te /
analyzed: 'jig rten bstan pa la gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la yang de skad byas zhes te /
translated: The chapter that illuminates the teaching of the world is called thus.

original: bcu gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the twelfth chapter.

original: // / khyad par gyi bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid rnams brjod pa ni bstan bcos las /
analyzed: // / khyad par gyi bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid rnams brjod pa ni bstan bcos las /
translated: The treatise explains the characteristics of the special nature:

original: bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyis //
analyzed: bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyis //
translated: The special nature is taught by the special features of the inconceivable and so forth.

original: khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can //üîΩskad cig ma ni bcu drug gis //
analyzed: khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can // skad cig ma ni bcu drug gis //
translated: It is distinguished by the domain of the truth.

original: khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
analyzed: khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
translated: The special characteristics are explained by the sixteen moments.

original: zhes te lam rnams la khyad par gzhan rnams kyis te /
analyzed: zhes te lam rnams la khyad par gzhan rnams kyis te /
translated: The paths are distinguished by other features.üîΩMoreover, they are inconceivable, incomparable,

original: de yang / bsam mi khyab dang mi mnyam dang // gzhal dang grangs las yang dag 'das //
analyzed: de yang / bsam mi khyab dang mi mnyam dang // gzhal dang grangs las yang dag 'das //
translated: beyond measure and number.

original: 'phags pa kun sdud mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: 'phags pa kun sdud mkhas pa yis //
translated: The wise who gather all the noble qualities

original: rig bya thun mong min shes nyid //
analyzed: rig bya thun mong min shes nyid //
translated: know the uncommon thing to be known.üîΩSwift knowledge, absence of decrease,üîΩaccomplishment, perfect achievement,üîΩobject, support,üîΩcompleteness, retention,

original: shes myur bri med gang med dang // bsgrub dang yang dag 'grub pa dang // dmigs pa rten dang bcas pa dang // mtha' dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang // ro myang med dang khyad par ni //
analyzed: shes myur bri med gang med dang // bsgrub dang yang dag 'grub pa dang // dmigs pa rten dang bcas pa dang // mtha' dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang // ro myang med dang khyad par ni //
translated: absence of relishing, and distinction

original: bcu drug bdag nyid shes bya ste //üîΩgang gis lam 'di gzhan dag las //
analyzed: bcu drug bdag nyid shes bya ste // gang gis lam 'di gzhan dag las //
translated: are the sixteen aspects to be known.üîΩSince this path is superior to other paths,

original: khyad du 'phags pas khyad par lam //
analyzed: khyad du 'phags pas khyad par lam //
translated: it is the special path.

original: zhes te / de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la dmigs pa'i mthong ba'i skad cig ma bzhi ste /
analyzed: zhes te / de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la dmigs pa'i mthong ba'i skad cig ma bzhi ste /
translated: There are four moments of seeing that focus on the truth of suffering:

original: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang rjes su shes pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang rjes su shes pa'o //
translated: the forbearance of the knowledge of the phenomena of suffering, the knowledge of the phenomena of suffering, the forbearance of the subsequent knowledge of suffering, and the subsequent knowledge of suffering.

original: 'di rnams kyi khyad par ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang / mi mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhal du med pa nyid dang / grangs med pa nyid de //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi khyad par ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang / mi mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhal du med pa nyid dang / grangs med pa nyid de //
translated: The distinctions of these are, respectively, inconceivability, inequality, immeasurability, and innumerability.

original: de rnams gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de rnams gsungs pa ni /
translated: Those are stated

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: beginning with ‚Äúthen.‚Äù

original: bya ba chen pos zhes pa gang du byed pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa ste /üîΩde'i phyir na zab mo zhes pa ste /
analyzed: bya ba chen pos zhes pa gang du byed pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa ste / de'i phyir na zab mo zhes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWith great deeds‚Äù is where great deeds are present.

original: @142a * // gang du de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i bya ba la /
analyzed: @142a * // gang du de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúprofound‚Äù is where such inconceivable deeds, etc.,üîΩare performed.

original: de nyid kyis na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúequal to the unequalled‚Äù is where such deeds are performed.

original: 'dir lnga ka'i khyad par gyi bya ba bstan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir lnga ka'i khyad par gyi bya ba bstan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, the deeds of the five distinctions are not taught.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces pa ni ji lta ba'i chos de bzhin du gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces pa ni ji lta ba'i chos de bzhin du gshegs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTathƒÅgata‚Äù is one who has gone to suchness.

original: sangs rgyas nyid ni rang nyid mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ni rang nyid mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBuddha‚Äù is one who has fully awakened by oneself.

original: rang 'byung ba nyid ni chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: rang 'byung ba nyid ni chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba nyid do //
translated: Self-arising is the mastery over all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad la dag cing chags pa med pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩji ltar 'di bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab ce na gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad la dag cing chags pa med pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // ji ltar 'di bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab ce na gsungs pa ni /
translated: The knowledge that is pure, unattached, and unobstructed with regard to all aspects of all phenomena is omniscience.üîΩHow is this activity inconceivable? It is stated:

original: mi nus pa zhes te /
analyzed: mi nus pa zhes te /
translated: It is not possible for the mind to conceive of it.

original: sems kyis zhes pa ni brjod pa yang sems la brten pa'i phyir bsam bas yul gzhan bsam pa rnams kyi sems dang bcas pa rnams te /
analyzed: sems kyis zhes pa ni brjod pa yang sems la brten pa'i phyir bsam bas yul gzhan bsam pa rnams kyi sems dang bcas pa rnams te /
translated: The mind is based on speech, so the mind of those who conceive of other objects is associated with speech.

original: sems ni rnam par shes pa la /
analyzed: sems ni rnam par shes pa la /
translated: The mind is consciousness.

original: de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: It is of two kinds:

original: mngon sum dang cig shos so //
analyzed: mngon sum dang cig shos so //
translated: direct perception and inference.

original: de la dang po 'jig rten la ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la sogs pa med la /
analyzed: de la dang po 'jig rten la ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la sogs pa med la /
translated: The first, direct perception, does not exist for worldly people with regard to the TathƒÅgata and so on.

original: cig shos su 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: cig shos su 'gyur na ni /
translated: If it were the latter,

original: de yang de'i ngo bo nyid gzung ba min te /
analyzed: de yang de'i ngo bo nyid gzung ba min te /
translated: that essence would not be apprehended.

original: gang sems kyi yul med pa la ni sems las byung ba rnams dang / sems rnams yang dag par rab tu ldan pa rnams med la /
analyzed: gang sems kyi yul med pa la ni sems las byung ba rnams dang / sems rnams yang dag par rab tu ldan pa rnams med la /
translated: For those who do not have an object of mind, mental factors and minds do not exist.

original: gang bsam par yang mi nus pa de ni shin tu yang gzhal bar mi nus zhes gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: gang bsam par yang mi nus pa de ni shin tu yang gzhal bar mi nus zhes gsungs pa ni /
translated: That which cannot be imagined cannot be evaluated at all.

original: bsam pa'am snyan par zhes te /
analyzed: bsam pa'am snyan par zhes te /
translated: That is to say, it cannot be imagined or spoken of.

original: de'i de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa nyid kyis mthong ba'i skad cig ma rnams su gsungs la /
analyzed: de'i de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa nyid kyis mthong ba'i skad cig ma rnams su gsungs la /
translated: Because its reality is the result of the inconceivable, etc., it is said to be the inconceivable, etc., in the moments of seeing.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dmigs pa'i phyir yang zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dmigs pa'i phyir yang zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: And because the inconceivable is perceived, it is to be spoken of.

original: gnas brtan zhes pa la sogs pas ni de go skabs so //
analyzed: gnas brtan zhes pa la sogs pas ni de go skabs so //
translated: The Elder, etc., is the opportunity for that.

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad la tshad med pa'i phyir zhes pa ni re re bzhin du gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams la'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad la tshad med pa'i phyir zhes pa ni re re bzhin du gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams la'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Subhuti, because all dharmas are immeasurable, etc., means that each one, such as form and feeling, is immeasurable.

original: gzhan du na bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag dbye ba med par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag dbye ba med par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, the probandum and the probative would be indistinguishable.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir zhes pa ni rgyu mi mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir zhes pa ni rgyu mi mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Because it is equal to space, it is said that the inconceivable, etc., are also because of the inequality of the cause.

original: de ci'i phyir zhes pa dang 'di lta ste zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhes pa dang 'di lta ste zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa kho na'o //
translated: Why is that? and so on, refers to form, etc.

original: de ma lags zhes pa ni kho na nyid du na ngo bo nyid @142b med pa'i phyir zhes pa la dgongs so //
analyzed: de ma lags zhes pa ni kho na nyid du na ngo bo nyid @142b med pa'i phyir zhes pa la dgongs so //
translated: It is not that, means that it is not just that, because of the absence of own-being.

original: 'dis kyang ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyis kyang ngo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis kyang ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyis kyang ngo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This also refers to the dharmata of the Tathagatas, etc.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir ngo bo nyid med pa nam mkha' lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos so zhes bsam pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir ngo bo nyid med pa nam mkha' lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos so zhes bsam pa'o //
translated: The thought is that the dharmadhatu, which is the nature of the utterly pure, is without own-being, like space, and is the dharma of all the Tathagatas.

original: mi mnyam par 'gro ba zhes pa dang 'di dang 'di mnyam zhes pa ni gnyis mnyam par nye bar gyur pa 'gyur ba las te /
analyzed: mi mnyam par 'gro ba zhes pa dang 'di dang 'di mnyam zhes pa ni gnyis mnyam par nye bar gyur pa 'gyur ba las te /
translated: Uneven movement and this is equal to that is from the change of two things becoming equal.üîΩ

original: mnyam par gyur pa med kyang mi mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam par gyur pa med kyang mi mnyam pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUneven‚Äù and ‚Äúeven‚Äù are from the transformation of the two becoming unevenly close.

original: nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúInconceivable‚Äù and so on are the summary.

original: rnam par shes par gyur zhes pa ni don dam par ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i rnam par shes pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob tu'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par shes par gyur zhes pa ni don dam par ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i rnam par shes pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob tu'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúConsciousness‚Äù means that ultimately consciousness is without intrinsic reality, and ‚Äúinconceivable‚Äù and so on are conventionally.

original: nam mkha' nye bar len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sa bon ma bzhag pa nyid kyis lus dang ngag dang blo la yon tan bral ba'i mtshan nyid kyi bag chags med pa'o//
analyzed: nam mkha' nye bar len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sa bon ma bzhag pa nyid kyis lus dang ngag dang blo la yon tan bral ba'i mtshan nyid kyi bag chags med pa'o//
translated: Space is without appropriation, because it is not the seed of affliction, and it is without the habitual propensities of the body, speech, and mind that are characterized by the absence of good qualities.

original: chos rnams la ni bden pa bzhi po rnams la ste /
analyzed: chos rnams la ni bden pa bzhi po rnams la ste /
translated: ‚ÄúDharmas‚Äù are the four noble truths.

original: chos 'di ni lam yin pa'i phyir dang / mig ni mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa ni chos kyi mig ste mthong ba'i lam mo //
analyzed: chos 'di ni lam yin pa'i phyir dang / mig ni mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa ni chos kyi mig ste mthong ba'i lam mo //
translated: The eye of Dharma is the path of seeing.

original: de'i bzod pa'i skad cig rnams kyis rdul dang bral bar 'gyur zhing shes pa'i skad cig rnams kyis ni dri ma med cing rtag par dag pa'o//
analyzed: de'i bzod pa'i skad cig rnams kyis rdul dang bral bar 'gyur zhing shes pa'i skad cig rnams kyis ni dri ma med cing rtag par dag pa'o//
translated: By the moments of acceptance, one becomes free from dust; by the moments of knowledge, one becomes stainless and always pure.

original: chos rnams la ni chos rnams thams cad la'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la ni chos rnams thams cad la'o //
translated: With regard to all dharmas, all dharmas.

original: bzod pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes rab ste /
analyzed: bzod pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes rab ste /
translated: Acceptance is uncontaminated wisdom.

original: de thob pa ni gang zhig sa brgyad pa la'o //
analyzed: de thob pa ni gang zhig sa brgyad pa la'o //
translated: Its attainment is that of the eighth stage.

original: yang bya ba chen po'i khyad par brjod par 'dod nas go skabs phye ba ni /
analyzed: yang bya ba chen po'i khyad par brjod par 'dod nas go skabs phye ba ni /
translated: Again, wishing to express the special greatness of his activity, he opens up the opportunity, saying,

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: 'dir 'di dang yang dag par ldan pa ni so sor 'brel pa'o zhes pa ni sdug bsngal gyi skad cig ma bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'di dang yang dag par ldan pa ni so sor 'brel pa'o zhes pa ni sdug bsngal gyi skad cig ma bzhi pa'o //
translated: Here, being endowed with this is the connection, and this is the fourth moment of suffering.

original: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Not grasping form, etc.

original: yongs su 'dzin par byed ces pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes so //
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin par byed ces pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes so //
translated: ‚ÄúGrasping‚Äù is the notion of grasping.

original: mngon par zhen pa ni dngos por 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa ni dngos por 'dzin pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúClinging‚Äù is the grasping of substantiality.

original: de dag gi rnam pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi rnam pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid do zhes pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúdestruction of their aspects‚Äù is the destruction of the aspects of the aggregates.

original: de bzhin du thams cad shes pa la sogs pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang mngon par zhen pa med pa dag gis /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad shes pa la sogs pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang mngon par zhen pa med pa dag gis /
translated: Similarly, with regard to the knowledge of all things, etc., there is no grasping and no clinging.

original: yang dag par 'dzin pa'i 'phags pa thams cad kyis kun tu 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyis ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin pa'i 'phags pa thams cad kyis kun tu 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyis ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúpatience of the knowledge of the origin‚Äù is the patience of the knowledge of the origin, which is the special grasping of all the Aryas who grasp the knowledge of all things, etc.

original: rab 'byor gyis @143a * //üîΩgsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis @143a * // gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Subhuti said, etc.

original: 'di rnams kyis bstan pa la skal ba med pa gsungs la /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis bstan pa la skal ba med pa gsungs la /
translated: Here, the Lord declares that they are not vessels for the teaching.

original: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pas ni skal ba dang ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pas ni skal ba dang ldan pa rnams so //
translated: But, etc.

original: rgyu ni rigs la bgyi ba bgyis pa ni bsod nams lhag par ro //
analyzed: rgyu ni rigs la bgyi ba bgyis pa ni bsod nams lhag par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúCause‚Äù refers to the spiritual gene; ‚Äúhaving done what had to be done‚Äù refers to the excess of merit.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma mnyan pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma mnyan pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The root of virtue is listening to the Bhagavatƒ´, etc.

original: gang gis ni zab pas so //
analyzed: gang gis ni zab pas so //
translated: By what? By the profound.

original: blta bar dka' ba ni byang bar dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blta bar dka' ba ni byang bar dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Difficult to see is difficult to understand.

original: 'di yang ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la rtogs par dka' ba ni mi shes pa rnams kyis rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di yang ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la rtogs par dka' ba ni mi shes pa rnams kyis rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is also difficult to realize in right view, because it is difficult for the ignorant to understand.

original: bgrod par dka' ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bgrod par dka' ba'i phyir te /
translated: Difficult to cross, because it is difficult to traverse.

original: 'dir ni mkhas pas rig par bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni mkhas pas rig par bya ba ste /
translated: Here, the wise should know.

original: chos shes pa'o //
analyzed: chos shes pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is to be known.

original: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If, etc.

original: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ni tshogs kyi sa pa ste /
analyzed: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ni tshogs kyi sa pa ste /
translated: The faith-follower is on the stage of accumulation.

original: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
translated: The stage of penetrating insight is the stage of others.

original: de'i sa la bskal pa dang de bas lhag pa ni bskal pa bas lhag pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sa la bskal pa dang de bas lhag pa ni bskal pa bas lhag pa'o //
translated: On that stage, an eon or more than an eon is more than an eon.

original: bzod pa ni chos la nges par gzhol ba'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa ni chos la nges par gzhol ba'i bzod pa'o //
translated: Patience is the patience of one who is intent on the Dharma.

original: zag pa med pa'i shes rab bo /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i shes rab bo /
translated: It is undefiled wisdom.

original: srid pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Existence is what is desired.

original: tshol ba ni ji ltar na de zhes pas so //
analyzed: tshol ba ni ji ltar na de zhes pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúSeeking‚Äù is by way of ‚Äúhow is that?‚Äù

original: sems pa ni rigs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: sems pa ni rigs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúThinking‚Äù is by way of the principles.

original: 'jal ba ni yongs su bcad nas de ltar gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: 'jal ba ni yongs su bcad nas de ltar gyur pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWeighing‚Äù is after having ascertained it, ‚Äúlike that.‚Äù

original: nye bar rtogs pa ni so sor rtogs pas so //
analyzed: nye bar rtogs pa ni so sor rtogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúRealizing‚Äù is by way of discerning.

original: nye bar sems pa ni mang du byed pas so //
analyzed: nye bar sems pa ni mang du byed pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúThinking about‚Äù is by way of doing it a lot.

original: 'di nyid ces pa ni thun mong ma yin par shes nas thun mong ma yin pa de'i khyad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid ces pa ni thun mong ma yin par shes nas thun mong ma yin pa de'i khyad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThis itself‚Äù is by way of knowing it to be not common, and by way of making the distinction of that uncommon one.

original: shes par byed ces pas ni shes pa la /
analyzed: shes par byed ces pas ni shes pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúCausing to know‚Äù is with respect to knowledge.

original: mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa de'i khyad par gyis te /
analyzed: mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes pa de'i khyad par gyis te /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of seeing‚Äù is by way of the distinction of that uncommon knowledge.

original: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: It is the receptivity to subsequent knowledge.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then the Bhagavat said to the Bodhisattva Paramarthasamudgata, etc.

original: 'di la spyod pa na mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: 'di la spyod pa na mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: Here, when practicing, it is nirvana.

original: rang gi byang chub po zhes pa ni myur du mngon par shes pa ste rjes su shes pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi byang chub po zhes pa ni myur du mngon par shes pa ste rjes su shes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne‚Äôs own enlightenment‚Äù is the swift higher perception, which is subsequent knowledge.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then the Bhagavat, etc.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas so //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúgreat perfection‚Äù is because it is equal to space.

original: dang po ni rkang pa gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: dang po ni rkang pa gnyis kyis so //
translated: The first is by the first two lines.

original: 'dis ni ji ltar nam mkha' la mi snang nas rang gi gnas thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni ji ltar nam mkha' la mi snang nas rang gi gnas thob par 'gyur te /
translated: Here, how does one attain one‚Äôs own state by not appearing in space?

original: nam mkha' la ni 'bri ba'am gang ba med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni 'bri ba'am gang ba med do //
translated: There is no decrease or increase in space.

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mi snang ba'i dman pa mchog gi byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mi snang ba'i dman pa mchog gi byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, by the perfection of wisdom, one attains the lesser and greater enlightenments by not appearing.

original: de la ni 'bri ba dang gang ba nyid med do zhes pa ni 'bri ba dang gang ba med pa'i khyad @143b par gyis te /
analyzed: de la ni 'bri ba dang gang ba nyid med do zhes pa ni 'bri ba dang gang ba med pa'i khyad @143b par gyis te /
translated: There is no decrease or increase in that. This is the distinction of no decrease or increase.

original: 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: This is the receptivity to the knowledge of the dharma of cessation.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i le'u ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i le'u ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o /
translated: The chapter on the inconceivable, etc., is the thirteenth chapter on the inconceivable.

original: // / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: thos pa dang lhan cig pa ni thos pa nyid la mos pa ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa dang lhan cig pa ni thos pa nyid la mos pa ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: The one who is together with hearing is not just hearing itself.

original: mi 'gong pa ni spro ba dman pa ma yin pa'o //üîΩkun tu mi zhum pa ni mi spro ba min pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'gong pa ni spro ba dman pa ma yin pa'o // kun tu mi zhum pa ni mi spro ba min pa'o //
translated: Not discouraged means not having little enthusiasm.üîΩNot fainthearted means not being enthusiastic.üîΩNot wavering means not turning back.

original: rnam par mi gnas pa ni mi ldog pa'o //üîΩso ma nyi ni phyin ci log gi'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi gnas pa ni mi ldog pa'o // so ma nyi ni phyin ci log gi'o //
translated: Not confused means not mistaken.

original: rmongs pa la sogs pa rnams med pas na rmongs par mi 'gyur ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa la sogs pa rnams med pas na rmongs par mi 'gyur ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Since there is no delusion, etc., it says ‚Äúnot deluded,‚Äù etc.

original: mngon par dga' ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par dga' ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Delighting means desiring.

original: mi spong ba ni btang snyoms su mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi spong ba ni btang snyoms su mi byed pa'o //
translated: Not abandoning means not being indifferent.

original: phyir phyogs pa ni rgyab tu kha phyir bltas pa'o //
analyzed: phyir phyogs pa ni rgyab tu kha phyir bltas pa'o //
translated: Turning away means turning one‚Äôs back.

original: rjes su 'brel ba ni ji ltar 'dun pas rjes su gnas pa ste rgyun du'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'brel ba ni ji ltar 'dun pas rjes su gnas pa ste rgyun du'o //
translated: Following means abiding in accordance with one‚Äôs aspiration, continuously.

original: phyi bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhes pa ni mdor bstan pa la mi gtong bar 'gyur zhes pa ni rgyas par bshad pa ste /
analyzed: phyi bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhes pa ni mdor bstan pa la mi gtong bar 'gyur zhes pa ni rgyas par bshad pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFollowing after‚Äù is the brief explanation, and ‚Äúnot letting go‚Äù is the extensive explanation.

original: lus la thogs pa zhes pa ni mdun du gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus la thogs pa zhes pa ni mdun du gyur pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúAttached to the body‚Äù means being in front.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rigs gsum rnams kyis sgrub pa la gnas pas khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni chos shes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rigs gsum rnams kyis sgrub pa la gnas pas khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni chos shes pa'o //
translated: Thus, the three types of bodhisattva potential are distinguished by their practice. This is the knowledge of the Dharma.

original: gang gis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: By whom, etc.

original: blo rgod par 'gyur ba ni rnam par g-yeng ba'o //
analyzed: blo rgod par 'gyur ba ni rnam par g-yeng ba'o //
translated: The mind is agitated by distraction.

original: ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du ni 'phrog par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du ni 'phrog par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is carried away like a cotton tuft by the wind.

original: 'dzin pa ni shes pa'o //üîΩzhugs pa ni rjes su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ni shes pa'o // zhugs pa ni rjes su gnas pa'o //
translated: It is held by consciousness.üîΩIt is engaged in, i.e., it abides in, the five perfections.

original: yongs su bskor bar byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba ste /
analyzed: yongs su bskor bar byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba ste /
translated: It is surrounded by the five perfections.

original: gsum po la /
analyzed: gsum po la /
translated: The three are the three stages.

original: rjes su'i sgra ni rjes su 'brel pa zhes pa'i don to zhes pa ni sa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su'i sgra ni rjes su 'brel pa zhes pa'i don to zhes pa ni sa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúafter‚Äù means ‚Äúin connection with.‚Äù This is the result of the accomplishment of the three stages.

original: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: This is the acceptance of subsequent knowledge.

original: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: For example, etc.

original: dus ni 'chi ba'i'o //
analyzed: dus ni 'chi ba'i'o //
translated: The time is the time of death.

original: bde ba zhes pa ni mi 'jigs par ro //
analyzed: bde ba zhes pa ni mi 'jigs par ro //
translated: The happiness is the fearlessness.

original: bar chad ni gegs byed pa'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: bar chad ni gegs byed pa'i dngos po'o //
translated: Obstacles are things that create hindrances.

original: ma smas pa ni ma snad pa'o //
analyzed: ma smas pa ni ma snad pa'o //
translated: Unharmed means uninjured.

original: nye bar 'tshe ba med pa ste nye bar 'tshe ba'i bar chad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar 'tshe ba med pa ste nye bar 'tshe ba'i bar chad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Without danger means without the danger of obstacles.

original: gang du zhes pa ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes pa ni dbus su'o //
translated: Where means in the middle.

original: ya nga ba'i las ni log pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: ya nga ba'i las ni log pa'i lam mo //
translated: Fearful action is a wrong path.

original: 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni ya nga bar ltung ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni ya nga bar ltung ba'o //
translated: Going is falling into fear.

original: dad pa la sogs pa yod pas bcom ldan 'das ma la sbyor ba'o //üîΩdad pa yod pa nyid ni yon tan dang ldan par @144a * //
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa yod pas bcom ldan 'das ma la sbyor ba'o // dad pa yod pa nyid ni yon tan dang ldan par @144a * //
translated: The application to the Bhagavatƒ´ is through the existence of faith, etc.

original: nus pa nyid la yang dag par yid ches pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa nyid la yang dag par yid ches pa'o //
translated: The existence of faith is the correct belief in the ability to possess good qualities.

original: bzod pa ni mi skye ba la sogs pa'i chos la bzod pa dang sbyor ba dang bcas pa rtsom pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: bzod pa ni mi skye ba la sogs pa'i chos la bzod pa dang sbyor ba dang bcas pa rtsom pa nyid la'o //
translated: Patience is in the acceptance of the dharmas of non-arising, etc., and in the undertaking of application.

original: sred pa ni sbyor ba rtsom par 'dod pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: sred pa ni sbyor ba rtsom par 'dod pa nyid la'o //
translated: Desire is the very desire to undertake application.

original: 'dun pa ni gong nas gong gi gnas skabs rnams la'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa ni gong nas gong gi gnas skabs rnams la'o //
translated: Aspiration is for the higher and higher states.

original: brtson 'grus ni sbyor ba la spro ba'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni sbyor ba la spro ba'o //
translated: Exertion is the delight in application.

original: bag yod pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dag la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du brten pa dang mi brten pa'o //
analyzed: bag yod pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dag la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du brten pa dang mi brten pa'o //
translated: Conscientiousness is the reliance on virtue and non-reliance on non-virtue, respectively.

original: mos pa ni bsgrub par bya ba bsgrub pa la'o //
analyzed: mos pa ni bsgrub par bya ba bsgrub pa la'o //
translated: Interest is in the accomplishment of what is to be achieved.

original: de ltar zhes pa ni nges par bstan pas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa ni nges par bstan pas so //
translated: Thus, means as has been taught.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa ni lhag par gzhol ba'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa ni lhag par gzhol ba'o //
translated: Superior attitude is the superior orientation.

original: stong pa ni sgrub pa'i bar du gcod pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa ni sgrub pa'i bar du gcod pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is the obstacles to accomplishment.

original: gus pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams sgrub pa las mi 'da' bar thams cad du mi stong pa'o //
analyzed: gus pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams sgrub pa las mi 'da' bar thams cad du mi stong pa'o //
translated: Respect is the non-abandonment of the practice of the buddhas, etc.

original: dga' ba ni sgrub par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni sgrub par byed pa la'o //
translated: Joy is in the accomplishment.

original: mgu ba ni chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgrubs pas mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: mgu ba ni chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgrubs pas mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: Contentment is the realization of all dharmas through the accomplishment of emptiness.

original: rab tu dang ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i bsgrubs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gus pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: rab tu dang ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i bsgrubs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gus pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: Faith is the special respect for the qualities of the accomplishment as they have been explained.

original: dga' ba ni bsgrub par nus pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: dga' ba ni bsgrub par nus pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Delight is in the ability to accomplish.

original: brtson pa mi gtong ba ni sems can thams cad kyi don du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i smon lam la sbyor ba'i dam bca' ba'i khur dang brtson 'grus kyi khur mi 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: brtson pa mi gtong ba ni sems can thams cad kyi don du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i smon lam la sbyor ba'i dam bca' ba'i khur dang brtson 'grus kyi khur mi 'dor ba'o //
translated: Not abandoning striving is not casting off the burden of the vow to apply oneself to the aspiration to attain the knowledge of all aspects for the sake of all beings, and the burden of striving.

original: gnas par 'gyur zhes pa ni dmigs pa'i khyad par gyis te /
analyzed: gnas par 'gyur zhes pa ni dmigs pa'i khyad par gyis te /
translated: ‚ÄúAbiding‚Äù is by the distinction of the objective support.

original: rjes su shes pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su shes pa'o //
translated: It is subsequent knowledge.

original: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFor example‚Äù and so on.

original: thabs la mkhas pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste /
translated: Skill in means is the five perfections.

original: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug pos yongs su bzung bas zhes pa nas ji srid du gnas par 'gyur zhes pa ni rten gyi khyad par gyis te /
analyzed: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug pos yongs su bzung bas zhes pa nas ji srid du gnas par 'gyur zhes pa ni rten gyi khyad par gyis te /
translated: Thus, by being taken hold of by the six perfections, from ‚Äúabiding‚Äù to ‚Äúas long as‚Äù is by the distinction of the basis.

original: lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: It is the receptivity to the knowledge of the dharma of the path.

original: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFor example‚Äù and so on.

original: mnyam pa ni ma lus par sbyor ba nyid kyis bya ba thams cad la'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa ni ma lus par sbyor ba nyid kyis bya ba thams cad la'o //
translated: Equality is in all activities by the application of the entirety.

original: ldan nas ni rjes su mthun pas so //
analyzed: ldan nas ni rjes su mthun pas so //
translated: Endowed is by compatibility.

original: theg pa ni theg pa'i snod du'o //
analyzed: theg pa ni theg pa'i snod du'o //
translated: Vehicle is in the vessel of the vehicle.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dag gis te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dag gis te /
translated: By the perfection of wisdom and skill in means.

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag ma lus pas so zhes pa ni chos shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag ma lus pas so zhes pa ni chos shes pa'o //
translated: By means of emptiness and compassion, without exception, is the knowledge of phenomena.

original: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is like this, for example, etc.

original: bshams pa ni mtha' dag la sbyar ba ni byed pa thams cad kyis so //
analyzed: bshams pa ni mtha' dag la sbyar ba ni byed pa thams cad kyis so //
translated: Prepared is applied to all, by all is by all the actions.

original: mthun pa ni rjes su mthun pas so //
analyzed: mthun pa ni rjes su mthun pas so //
translated: Agreeable is in accordance with.

original: theg pa ni bzhon pa ste snod do //
analyzed: theg pa ni bzhon pa ste snod do //
translated: Vehicle is a conveyance, a vessel.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa @144b dag gis stong pa dang / snying rje dag dang ma bral bas zhes pa ni chos shes pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa @144b dag gis stong pa dang / snying rje dag dang ma bral bas zhes pa ni chos shes pa'o //
translated: By the perfection of wisdom and skill in means, without separation from emptiness and compassion, is the knowledge of phenomena.

original: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste brgya nyi shu zhes pa ni tshe lo brgya dang nyi shu'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste brgya nyi shu zhes pa ni tshe lo brgya dang nyi shu'o //
translated: It is like this, for example, etc. One hundred and twenty is one hundred and twenty years.

original: yongs su gzung ba ni gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba ni gzhan gyis so //
translated: Possession is by another.

original: khri ni mal khri'o //
analyzed: khri ni mal khri'o //
translated: Throne is a bed.

original: 'jig pa ni zad par ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa ni zad par ro //
translated: Destruction is exhaustion.

original: gang gis ni phyogs gang du ji srid du ring por ro //
analyzed: gang gis ni phyogs gang du ji srid du ring por ro //
translated: By whom? In which direction? For how long? For a long time.

original: gnas pa ni grong khyer ro zhes pa ni yongs su gzung bas te /
analyzed: gnas pa ni grong khyer ro zhes pa ni yongs su gzung bas te /
translated: The abode is the city, which is the object of retention.

original: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience is the patience of subsequent understanding.

original: nye bar mtshon pa ni dpe ste /
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa ni dpe ste /
translated: The illustration is the example.

original: rgya mtsho'i gru la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i gru la sogs pa'o //
translated: The ship and so on are the examples.

original: de brjod pa'i le'u ste de'i dpe'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: de brjod pa'i le'u ste de'i dpe'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
translated: This is the fourteenth chapter on the example of the ship.

original: // / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, the Bhagavan, having rejoiced in the Bodhisattva Vajraketu's speech, said to the Bodhisattva Sarva shuddhƒÅ≈õaya, Excellent, excellent, O son of good family, excellent!

original: gnas par bya ba ni sgrub pas so //
analyzed: gnas par bya ba ni sgrub pas so //
translated: The abiding is the accomplishment.

original: bslab par bya ba ni yongs su shes pa la'o //üîΩbsten par bya ba ni yongs su gtong bas so //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba ni yongs su shes pa la'o // bsten par bya ba ni yongs su gtong bas so //
translated: The training is the thorough understanding.üîΩThe reliance is the thorough relinquishment.

original: bsnyen par bya ba ni kun tu brten pas so //
analyzed: bsnyen par bya ba ni kun tu brten pas so //
translated: The proximity is the thorough application.

original: rnal 'byor zhes pa ni rab tu sbyor ba'am mngon par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes pa ni rab tu sbyor ba'am mngon par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The yoga is the application or the intense application.

original: ma bsnyems zhes pa ni de dngos por mi 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: ma bsnyems zhes pa ni de dngos por mi 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The non-arrogance is not grasping it as a thing.

original: mi bsnyems pa'o zhes pa ni chos rnams thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mi bsnyems pa'o zhes pa ni chos rnams thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arrogance is the non-conceptuality of all phenomena.

original: yongs su sbyor ba ni goms pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su sbyor ba ni goms pa'o //
translated: The thorough application is the cultivation.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni rlom pa med pa dang ro myang ba med pa'i khyad par gyis lam la rjes su shes pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni rlom pa med pa dang ro myang ba med pa'i khyad par gyis lam la rjes su shes pa'o //
translated: The correct dedication to perfect complete enlightenment is the subsequent knowledge of the path, distinguished by the absence of conceit and the absence of relishing.

original: byed pa rnam pa bcu gcig ste de ni bstan bcos las /
analyzed: byed pa rnam pa bcu gcig ste de ni bstan bcos las /
translated: The eleven kinds of activity are stated in the treatise:üîΩThe refuge of benefit and happiness,üîΩthe refuge of humans,

original: phan dang bde ba skyob pa dang // mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang // gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni //üîΩyongs 'dren pa zhes bya ba dang // lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyi //
analyzed: phan dang bde ba skyob pa dang // mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang // gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni // yongs 'dren pa zhes bya ba dang // lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyi //
translated: the support, the protector, the island,üîΩthe guide,üîΩthe spontaneous, and the one who does not actualizeüîΩthe fruits of the three vehicles,

original: 'bras bu mngon du mi byed bdag / tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: 'bras bu mngon du mi byed bdag / tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste //
translated: the last is the activity of support.

original: 'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
analyzed: 'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
translated: This is the characteristic of activity.

original: zhes te de la gsungs pa ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes te de la gsungs pa ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Regarding that, the statement is from the request of Subhuti and so on.

original: dka' ba bgyid pa zhes pa la sogs pas ni go skabs so //
analyzed: dka' ba bgyid pa zhes pa la sogs pas ni go skabs so //
translated: With the words performing difficult activities and so on, there is the opportunity.

original: 'jig rten la phan pa zhes pa ni byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'gro ba lnga'i sems can yongs su dgrol bar byas nas de rnams mi 'jigs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod cing zhes pa'i phan pa ni byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten la phan pa zhes pa ni byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'gro ba lnga'i sems can yongs su dgrol bar byas nas de rnams mi 'jigs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod cing zhes pa'i phan pa ni byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase for the benefit of the world means that, having fully awakened to supreme enlightenment, he has liberated the sentient beings of the five destinies, and has established them in the fearlessness of nirvana. The benefit is the action.

original: 'jig rten la bde ba zhes pa ni sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la bkod nas zhes pa ni bde ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten la bde ba zhes pa ni sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la bkod nas zhes pa ni bde ba byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase for the happiness of the world means that, having established sentient beings in the happiness of nirvana, he has made them happy.

original: 'jig rten gyi skyob pa la sogs pa ni mdor bstan pa la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi skyob pa la sogs pa ni mdor bstan pa la /
translated: The brief explanation of the world's protector, etc. is as follows.üîΩThe phrase how is it?

original: ji ltar na zhes pa ni @145a * //
analyzed: ji ltar na zhes pa ni @145a * //
translated: is the question.

original: sgra brgyad po rnams kyis ni rgyas par bshad de /
analyzed: sgra brgyad po rnams kyis ni rgyas par bshad de /
translated: The eight terms are the extensive explanation.

original: don du gnyer zhes pa ni go cha bgo ba'o //
analyzed: don du gnyer zhes pa ni go cha bgo ba'o //
translated: The phrase for the sake of is the donning of the armor.

original: brtson 'grus ni sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni sbyor ba la'o //
translated: The phrase for the sake of is the application of effort.

original: skyabs su 'gyur ba ni skyabs byed pas so zhes pa ni skyabs kyi byed pa'o //
analyzed: skyabs su 'gyur ba ni skyabs byed pas so zhes pa ni skyabs kyi byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase for the sake of is the action of protection, since he is the protector.

original: skye ba la sogs pa nyid kyi chos de la sbyor bas skye ba la sogs pa'i chos can la skyob par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni skyob pa'i byed pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa nyid kyi chos de la sbyor bas skye ba la sogs pa'i chos can la skyob par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni skyob pa'i byed pa'o //
translated: Since it is applied to the phenomena of arising, etc., it is the protector of the phenomena of arising, etc. This is the function of protection.

original: gang la 'brel pa med pa de ni sbyor ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gang la 'brel pa med pa de ni sbyor ba med pa'o //
translated: That which is not related is not applied.

original: gang la sbyor ba med pa de ni 'brel pa med pa'o zhes pa'i gnyi ga phan tshun tha dad pa gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la sbyor ba med pa de ni 'brel pa med pa'o zhes pa'i gnyi ga phan tshun tha dad pa gsungs pa ste /
translated: That which is not applied is not related. Thus, both are mutually distinguished.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ni skye ba med pa ste gdod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ni skye ba med pa ste gdod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of non-relation is non-arising, i.e., not arising from the beginning.

original: 'gag pa med pa ni skyes pa med pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa ni skyes pa med pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Non-cessation is due to non-arising.

original: de'i phyir na skye ba dang 'gag pa dag gis sbyor ba med pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir na skye ba dang 'gag pa dag gis sbyor ba med pa la /
translated: Therefore, there is no application of arising and cessation.

original: 'brel pa med pa yang de dag nyid kyis te /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa yang de dag nyid kyis te /
translated: Non-relation is due to those very two,

original: chos nyid tsam gyi phyir ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: chos nyid tsam gyi phyir ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: because of mere reality. This is the intended meaning.

original: de ltar shes shing mthong bas sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar shes shing mthong bas sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, by knowing and seeing in this way, there is non-application.

original: 'dir ni gnas par byas pas gnas te /
analyzed: 'dir ni gnas par byas pas gnas te /
translated: Here, by being made to abide, there is abiding.

original: de bstan pas gnas su 'gyur ro zhes pa ni gnas kyi byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bstan pas gnas su 'gyur ro zhes pa ni gnas kyi byed pa'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is taught as a basis‚Äù is the function of a basis.

original: dpung gnyen ni pha rol thob pa po la gzugs kyi pha rol ni stong pa nyid de de la ni gzugs med de kun rdzob tu dbye ba ni tha snyad kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dpung gnyen ni pha rol thob pa po la gzugs kyi pha rol ni stong pa nyid de de la ni gzugs med de kun rdzob tu dbye ba ni tha snyad kyi phyir ro //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe other shore of form is emptiness‚Äù is the other shore of form, which is emptiness, because form does not exist in emptiness.üîΩThe division into conventional and ultimate is for the sake of conventional expression.

original: don dam pa la ni ji ltar gzugs kyi pha rol stong pa nyid de ltar gzugs so zhes pas so //
analyzed: don dam pa la ni ji ltar gzugs kyi pha rol stong pa nyid de ltar gzugs so zhes pas so //
translated: In the ultimate, form is emptiness, and emptiness is form.

original: de nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is the reality of form, because emptiness and dependent arising are not different.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa rnams dang de ltar chos rnams thams cad kyi yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa rnams dang de ltar chos rnams thams cad kyi yang ngo //
translated: It is the same for feelings and so on, and in that way it is for all phenomena.

original: 'o na de nyid mkhyen pa mngon par byang chub pa'o zhes de ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na de nyid mkhyen pa mngon par byang chub pa'o zhes de ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then the knowledge of that is the full awakening to buddhahood,

original: chos nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: chos nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because there is no conceptualization in reality.

original: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa ni lan te /
analyzed: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa ni lan te /
translated: The response to that is indicated by ‚ÄúThis is also . . .‚Äù

original: de ltar na ji ltar mkhyen par 'gyur zhes pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar na ji ltar mkhyen par 'gyur zhes pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThus, how could it be known?‚Äù

original: 'di ltar bdag cag gi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag cag gi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThus, we say that the TathƒÅgata is the supreme friend of the world.‚Äù

original: mchog ni pha rol la de las byung ba'i shes pa'i chos de yis bstan pas dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhes pa ni dpung gnyen gyi byed pas so //
analyzed: mchog ni pha rol la de las byung ba'i shes pa'i chos de yis bstan pas dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhes pa ni dpung gnyen gyi byed pas so //
translated: The supreme friend is the one who teaches the Dharma that arises from the knowledge of the other, i.e., the disciple.

original: sngon gyi mtha' ni skye ba la phyi ma'i mtha' ni 'gag pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' ni skye ba la phyi ma'i mtha' ni 'gag pa'o //
translated: The past is birth and the future is cessation.

original: 'di dag gis yongs su chad pa ni yongs su btang ba ste /
analyzed: 'di dag gis yongs su chad pa ni yongs su btang ba ste /
translated: They are completely abandoned by those who completely cut them off.

original: chos rnams thams cad don dam par ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad don dam par ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all dharmas are ultimately without essence.

original: gang @145b yang de dag gis de rnams yongs su bcad pas 'di rnams zhi ba ste /
analyzed: gang @145b yang de dag gis de rnams yongs su bcad pas 'di rnams zhi ba ste /
translated: They are pacified by those who completely cut them off.

original: sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the pacification of suffering.

original: gya nom pa ni mi gtsang ba'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gya nom pa ni mi gtsang ba'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are sublime because they are the pacification of the afflictions of impurity.

original: mya nyan las 'das pa ni yang srid pa zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mya nyan las 'das pa ni yang srid pa zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are beyond misery because they are the end of rebirth.

original: ji lta ba bzhin ni don dam pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin ni don dam pa'i phyir ro //
translated: As it is in reality means in terms of the ultimate.

original: phyin ci ma log pa ni phyin ci log gi dmigs pa med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa ni phyin ci log gi dmigs pa med pa'i phyir la /
translated: Nonerroneous means that it is not the object of error.

original: de nyid gling dang chos mthun pas gling ste /
analyzed: de nyid gling dang chos mthun pas gling ste /
translated: It is an island because it is similar to an island.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos kyi dbyings des ston pas na gling du gyur pa'o zhes pa ni gling gi byed pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos kyi dbyings des ston pas na gling du gyur pa'o zhes pa ni gling gi byed pa'o //
translated: It is an island because it teaches the reality realm, which is characterized by the absence of intrinsic reality.

original: sgo nga'i phyi rol gyi cha ni sbubs te /
analyzed: sgo nga'i phyi rol gyi cha ni sbubs te /
translated: The outer part of the egg is the shell.

original: g-yogs par byed cing sbyor ba med pas sgo nga las 'dir skyes zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: g-yogs par byed cing sbyor ba med pas sgo nga las 'dir skyes zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said that one is born from the egg because it covers and encloses.

original: ling tog ni mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: ling tog ni mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir te /
translated: The cataract is the eye disease that is contrary to sight.

original: de nas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang ling tog gis kun tu khebs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang ling tog gis kun tu khebs pa ste /
translated: Then, one is completely covered by the shell and cataract of ignorance.

original: de nyid kyis na gti mug gi mun par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na gti mug gi mun par byas pa'o //
translated: It is the darkness of delusion.

original: snang bar zhes pa ni snang bar byed pas mun pa bcom zhing sel bar byed cing de ltar 'di rnams la snang bar byed pas na snang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: snang bar zhes pa ni snang bar byed pas mun pa bcom zhing sel bar byed cing de ltar 'di rnams la snang bar byed pas na snang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIllumination‚Äù is the illumination that destroys and dispels darkness. Thus, it is illumination because it illuminates these. This is the illumination.

original: de yang gling dang snang ba ni chos mthun te /
analyzed: de yang gling dang snang ba ni chos mthun te /
translated: Moreover, the continents and illumination are similar.

original: lung la'o // 'on kyang gling thob par byed ces pas gling la ded dpon dang de'i las kyi gling ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: lung la'o // 'on kyang gling thob par byed ces pas gling la ded dpon dang de'i las kyi gling ni 'di lta ste /
translated: However, since it is said that ‚Äúone obtains the continents,‚Äù the captain and his work are the continents.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rin po che'i gling gi tshul gyis te /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rin po che'i gling gi tshul gyis te /
translated: The continents are like the jewel island of nirvana.

original: 'dir yum bar ma las rnam pa gsum du gling gi byed pas gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir yum bar ma las rnam pa gsum du gling gi byed pas gsungs so //
translated: Here, the middle Stages of Meditation teaches the function of the continents in three ways.

original: rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid de /
translated: The nature of all phenomena is emptiness.

original: des na de rnams la skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos bstan pa ni yongs su 'dren pa ste /
analyzed: des na de rnams la skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos bstan pa ni yongs su 'dren pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the teaching of the Dharma of nonarising and noncessation is the guide.

original: 'di yongs su sgrol ba po dang don dam par rtogs pa po'i zhes pa ni yongs su 'dren pa'i byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yongs su sgrol ba po dang don dam par rtogs pa po'i zhes pa ni yongs su 'dren pa'i byed pa'o //
translated: The one who is the guide and the one who realizes the ultimate is the captain. This is the function of the guide.

original: theg pa gsum po rnams kyis lhun gyis grub par sems can gyi don byed pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i byed pa'o //üîΩtheg pa gsum po rnams kyis 'bras bu mngon sum du mdzad pa'i bya ba'i bdag nyid can zhes pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / rnam par byang ba can gyi chos rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bgrod bya dang bgrod pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed pa'i bya ba bkag pas so zhes pa ni /
analyzed: theg pa gsum po rnams kyis lhun gyis grub par sems can gyi don byed pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i byed pa'o // theg pa gsum po rnams kyis 'bras bu mngon sum du mdzad pa'i bya ba'i bdag nyid can zhes pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / rnam par byang ba can gyi chos rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bgrod bya dang bgrod pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed pa'i bya ba bkag pas so zhes pa ni /
translated: The spontaneous activity is the spontaneous benefit of sentient beings by the three vehicles.üîΩThe activity of the result is the activity of the three vehicles that is the nature of the direct realization of the result.

original: theg pa gsum gyi nges par 'byung ba de'i 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa'i byed pa'o //üîΩnam mkha'i rten @146a * //
analyzed: theg pa gsum gyi nges par 'byung ba de'i 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa'i byed pa'o // nam mkha'i rten @146a * //
translated: The activity of non-performance is the activity of the result of the three vehicles that is the non-performance of the direct realization of the result.

original: can ni nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: can ni nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The support of space is the limit of space.

original: ji ltar nam mkha' zhes pa nam mkha' ni rdzas med pa tsam la /
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' zhes pa nam mkha' ni rdzas med pa tsam la /
translated: Space is the mere absence of substance.

original: ma byas pa ste ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma byas pa ste ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is unfabricated because it is unborn.

original: rnam par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas skabs gzhan du skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas skabs gzhan du skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not transformed because it does not arise in another state.

original: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ni rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis so //
analyzed: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ni rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis so //
translated: It is not compounded because of causes and conditions.

original: gnas pa ni skye ba mi 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa ni skye ba mi 'jig pa'o //
translated: It is abiding because it does not destroy arising.

original: yang dag par gnas pa ni khor yug tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par gnas pa ni khor yug tu gnas pa'o //
translated: It is well-abiding because it abides in a circle.

original: rnam par gnas pa ni kha cig tu gnas pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par gnas pa ni kha cig tu gnas pa ste /
translated: It is situated because it abides in a certain place.

original: de las bzlog pas ni mi gnas pa la sogs pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de las bzlog pas ni mi gnas pa la sogs pa gsum ste /
translated: The opposite of that is the three: non-abiding, etc.

original: thams cad rnam par rtog pa med cing lhun gyis grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la dgongs pa'o /
analyzed: thams cad rnam par rtog pa med cing lhun gyis grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la dgongs pa'o /
translated: The intention is that all of them are the nature of non-conceptuality and spontaneity.

original: ji ltar nam mkha'i rten de bzhin du stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rten te /
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha'i rten de bzhin du stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rten te /
translated: Just as space is the support, so too emptiness, etc. are the supports.

original: de nyid la rten med pa nyid rten no zhes chos rnams thams cad de ltar bstan pas rten du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rten gyi byed pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid la rten med pa nyid rten no zhes chos rnams thams cad de ltar bstan pas rten du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rten gyi byed pa ste /
translated: That very non-support is the support. Thus, by teaching all phenomena in that way, it becomes the support. This is the function of the support.

original: rten de nyid thob pa'i byed pa'o //
analyzed: rten de nyid thob pa'i byed pa'o //
translated: That very support is the function of attainment.

original: ma skyes pa'i rten ngo bo gang dag de bzhin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i rten ngo bo gang dag de bzhin te /
translated: The support of the unborn is just the same as the nature of those.

original: 'dis rgyas par bshad pa ni skye ba med pa'i rten can zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis rgyas par bshad pa ni skye ba med pa'i rten can zhes pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of ‚Äúthe support of non-arising.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir na dngos po med pa nyid du zhes pa ni de kho na nyid dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na dngos po med pa nyid du zhes pa ni de kho na nyid dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúas non-entities‚Äù means that reality is non-entity.

original: de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam par ro gcig pa nyid kyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam par ro gcig pa nyid kyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Thus, it is the nature of a dream, because it is the same in terms of the conventional and the ultimate.

original: bye brag gzhan gsungs pa ni ;
analyzed: bye brag gzhan gsungs pa ni ;
translated: The other distinctions are stated:

original: bdag ces pa ste /
analyzed: bdag ces pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe self‚Äù

original: ji ltar bdag med pa de bzhin du med la /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag med pa de bzhin du med la /
translated: is non-existent just as the self is non-existent.

original: bdag gis rten byas pa bzhin du rten de rnams so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gis rten byas pa bzhin du rten de rnams so zhes pa'o //
translated: The supports are just like the support of the self.

original: 'di rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' dang bral bas na mu med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' dang bral bas na mu med pa'o //
translated: This is free from the extremes of eternalism and nihilism, and therefore it is ‚Äúwithout extremes.‚Äù

original: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo rnams kyi mu la nges par 'jig pa med pas chad pa med de /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo rnams kyi mu la nges par 'jig pa med pas chad pa med de /
translated: Since there is no destruction of the nature of the real conventional, there is no nihilism.

original: mu med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
analyzed: mu med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
translated: The nature of the absence of extremes is the nature of the absence of extremes.

original: don dam pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa zhi bas zhi ba la shes bya'i sgrib pa zhi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste de'i rten can no //
analyzed: don dam pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa zhi bas zhi ba la shes bya'i sgrib pa zhi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste de'i rten can no //
translated: Since the obscurations of affliction are pacified by the ultimate, it is peace. The pacification of the obscurations to omniscience is nirvana, and it is the basis of that.

original: sgrib pa gnyi ga yang kun rdzob pa glo bur ba'i phyir la de kho nar ni ma skyes pa'o zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa gnyi ga yang kun rdzob pa glo bur ba'i phyir la de kho nar ni ma skyes pa'o zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
translated: Since both obscurations are adventitious on the conventional level, they are unarisen in reality. This is the intended meaning.

original: dbyung du med pa ni chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbyung du med de /
analyzed: dbyung du med pa ni chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbyung du med de /
translated: The unremovable is the nature of the correct conventional reality of phenomena, which is unremovable.

original: bar mtshams med pas yod pa'i phyir de la chad pa med pas so sor dbyung du med pa'i rten can te dri ma dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs su yang rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrib pa med pa'i mya @146b ngan las
analyzed: bar mtshams med pas yod pa'i phyir de la chad pa med pas so sor dbyung du med pa'i rten can te dri ma dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs su yang rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrib pa med pa'i mya @146b ngan las
translated: Since it is uninterrupted, it is without annihilation. It is the basis of the indivisibility of the unremovable, which is the nature of nirvana that is free from obscurations, the reality that is naturally completely pure even during the phase of possessing stains.

original: 'das pa'i ngo bo can gang rnams la gang du dbyung du med ces pa ni dbyung du med pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa'i ngo bo can gang rnams la gang du dbyung du med ces pa ni dbyung du med pa'o //
translated: In what and where is it unremovable? It is unremovable.

original: kun rdzob tu sgrib pa las 'byin par brjod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu sgrib pa las 'byin par brjod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: It is said that one is freed from obscurations conventionally, not ultimately.

original: de'i phyir na /üîΩ'phags pas mya ngan 'das dang srid pa nyid //
analyzed: de'i phyir na / 'phags pas mya ngan 'das dang srid pa nyid //
translated: Therefore,üîΩthe noble ones do not have both nirvana and existence.

original: gnyis su yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: gnyis su yod pa ma yin te //
translated: Existence is not dual.

original: srid pa yongs su shes pa la //
analyzed: srid pa yongs su shes pa la //
translated: When existence is fully understood,

original: mya ngan 'das zhes brjod pa yin //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das zhes brjod pa yin //
translated: it is called nirvana.

original: zhes pas ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pas ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba'o //
translated: This shows that there is neither coming nor going.

original: mi g-yo ba ni chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la mi 'da' zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mi g-yo ba ni chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la mi 'da' zhes pa ni /
translated: The unmoving is the essence of the dharmadhatu tathata.

original: gzhan du rten pa bkag cing dmigs pa med pa'i sbyor bas thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rten gyi byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du rten pa bkag cing dmigs pa med pa'i sbyor bas thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rten gyi byed pa'o //
translated: The statement that it is not transcended is the refutation of a different support. It is attained through the application of non-apprehension. This is the function of the support.

original: rten du 'gyur zhes gsungs pa'i nye bar bsdus pa'i rten du 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rten du 'gyur zhes gsungs pa'i nye bar bsdus pa'i rten du 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit becomes the support‚Äù is the summary of ‚Äúit becomes the support.‚Äù

original: ngo bo nyid kyi dbang du byas na bstan bcos las /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi dbang du byas na bstan bcos las /
translated: From the perspective of its essence, the treatise says:

original: nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang // mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang // dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang // ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang // mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang // dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang // mi mthun phyogs dang med dang de //
analyzed: nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang // mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang // dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang // ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang // mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang // dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang // mi mthun phyogs dang med dang de //
translated: the prohibition of attachment,üîΩand that which is called the objective support,üîΩthe counteragent, the absence, and thatüîΩ.üîΩThe groundlessness, the non-going, the non-arising,üîΩand likewise the non-apprehension of reality,üîΩand the intrinsic reality‚Äîthese sixteen

original: gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang // de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang // ngo bo nyid kyi bcu drug bdag / mtshan nyid can ltar mtshon pa yi //
analyzed: gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang // de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang // ngo bo nyid kyi bcu drug bdag / mtshan nyid can ltar mtshon pa yi //
translated: are the characteristics of the illustrative,

original: mtshan nyid bzhi par bzhed pa yin //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bzhi par bzhed pa yin //
translated: which are considered the four characteristics.

original: zhes te mtshon bya dang sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di la yod ces mtshan nyid ces pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te mtshon bya dang sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di la yod ces mtshan nyid ces pa'o //
translated: The characteristic is that which is said to exist in this illustration and application.üîΩThe illustration is

original: mtshon zhes pa ste /
analyzed: mtshon zhes pa ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúsymbol‚Äù refers to the following.üîΩ

original: gang yang mtshon bya la zhes pa ni 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang mtshon bya la zhes pa ni 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: That which is said to be illustrated is the extensive explanation of this.

original: 'di'i go skabs ni rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di'i go skabs ni rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The opportunity for this is the request of Subh≈´ti and so on.

original: spyad pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'o //
analyzed: spyad pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'o //
translated: The practice is in the six perfections.

original: bsrung bar 'gyur zhes pa ni spyod pa po'o //
analyzed: bsrung bar 'gyur zhes pa ni spyod pa po'o //
translated: The one who practices is the one who will protect.

original: 'dul ba ni bsal bar rigs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba ni bsal bar rigs zhes pa'o //
translated: The discipline is the one who should be expelled.

original: gdul bar bya ba rnams dben pa ni 'di rnams kyi ngo bo nyid de chos kyi dbyings so zhes pas de bzhin nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: gdul bar bya ba rnams dben pa ni 'di rnams kyi ngo bo nyid de chos kyi dbyings so zhes pas de bzhin nyid du bshad do //
translated: The discipline is the nature of these, which is the reality realm, the suchness of those to be disciplined.

original: 'di rnams kyis ngo bo nyid rnam pa bzhi bshad de /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis ngo bo nyid rnam pa bzhi bshad de /
translated: These explain the four natures.

original: de dag nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
translated: The afflictions are attachment and so on.

original: nyon mongs pa'i rtags ni nyon mongs pas byas pa'i lus la sogs pa'i gnas ngan len la nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rtags ni nyon mongs pas byas pa'i lus la sogs pa'i gnas ngan len la nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The signs of the afflictions are the negative tendencies of the body and so on that are created by the afflictions. The signs of the afflictions are incorrect mental activity and so on.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags med pa @147a * //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags med pa @147a * //
translated: The discordant classes and the antidotes are attachment and nonattachment,

original: dang / zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug dang gti mug med pa'o //
analyzed: dang / zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug dang gti mug med pa'o //
translated: aversion and nonaversion, and confusion and nonconfusion.

original: 'di nyid kyi ngo bo rtogs nas gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas bstan par 'gyur bas rten du 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi ngo bo rtogs nas gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas bstan par 'gyur bas rten du 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: Having realized the essence of this, one will become the support for the one who will fully awaken and teach.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subh≈´ti said:

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so forth.

original: gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gis rtogs pa'i phyir ma yin la /
analyzed: gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gis rtogs pa'i phyir ma yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúNot related to form‚Äù means that it is not the intrinsic nature of form and so on that is realized by oneself,

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnams sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir yang ma yin zhing sa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid rang gis rtogs pa la ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnams sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir yang ma yin zhing sa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid rang gis rtogs pa la ma yin zhing /
translated: nor is it the intrinsic nature of form and so on for the sake of sentient beings, nor is it the intrinsic nature of the three stages that is realized by oneself,

original: byang chub pa'i ngo bo nyid gsum pos sems can gyi don la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: byang chub pa'i ngo bo nyid gsum pos sems can gyi don la yang ma yin te /
translated: nor is it the intrinsic nature of awakening for the sake of sentient beings through the three aspects of awakening.üîΩIt should be seen as abiding as one without the three.

original: gsum med cing gcig nyid du gnas par blta bar bya'o zhes pa la dgongs pa'o zhes pa ni dka' ba'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: gsum med cing gcig nyid du gnas par blta bar bya'o zhes pa la dgongs pa'o zhes pa ni dka' ba'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: This is the difficult intrinsic nature.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Having said this, and so forth.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i don ni don gyi dbang la /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i don ni don gyi dbang la /
translated: The meaning of the desired object is the power of the object.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid la zhes pa ni mtha' gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid la'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid la zhes pa ni mtha' gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the stage of the Buddha‚Äù means in the nature of the one extreme.

original: gzhan gyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni ched du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni ched du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúOther‚Äù and so on refers to the nature of the aim.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Subh≈´ti said, and so on.

original: zab mo ni sgom pa dang sgom pa po dang bsgom par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dngos po dang / de la dmigs pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i dngos por nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: zab mo ni sgom pa dang sgom pa po dang bsgom par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dngos po dang / de la dmigs pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i dngos por nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe profound‚Äù is the non-apprehension of the perfection of wisdom, which is the object of meditation, the meditator, and the meditation, as an accomplished entity.

original: 'dir nam mkha' sgom pa ni chos 'di dag thams cad mi sgom pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir nam mkha' sgom pa ni chos 'di dag thams cad mi sgom pa ste /
translated: Here, the meditation on space is the non-meditation of all these phenomena.

original: chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all phenomena are of one taste with emptiness.

original: de'i phyir na chags pa med par sgom pa 'di dag gis kyang mtha' yas pa sgom pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na chags pa med par sgom pa 'di dag gis kyang mtha' yas pa sgom pa'o //
translated: Therefore, by these meditations without attachment, one meditates on the infinite.

original: chos rnams thams cad dmigs pa la gegs med pa de chos rnams las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad dmigs pa la gegs med pa de chos rnams las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the unobstructed object of all phenomena is not other than phenomena.

analyzed: yod pa ma yin sgom pa ma yin la / yod pa sgom pa'ang ma yin zhing /
