translated: The meaning of ‚Äúgrasp‚Äù is ‚Äúto hold.‚Äù

original: gnas par bya'o zhes pa ni sems pas gcig tu nges @160b pas so //
analyzed: gnas par bya'o zhes pa ni sems pas gcig tu nges @160b pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should abide‚Äù means to be certain through reflection.

original: bslab par bya ba ni 'jal bas zhi gnas skyed pa'o //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba ni 'jal bas zhi gnas skyed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train‚Äù means to generate tranquility through evaluation.

original: bsgrub par bya zhes pa ni nges par rtogs pas lhag mthong skyed pas so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya zhes pa ni nges par rtogs pas lhag mthong skyed pas so //
translated: The to be accomplished is the generation of insight by means of definite understanding.

original: gzhag pa ni gzhung mnyan nas so //
analyzed: gzhag pa ni gzhung mnyan nas so //
translated: The to be placed is the scriptural text, by means of hearing.

original: bshad pa ni don shes pas so //
analyzed: bshad pa ni don shes pas so //
translated: The to be explained is the meaning, by means of understanding.

original: nye bar bstan pa ni snying po bsgrags pas so //
analyzed: nye bar bstan pa ni snying po bsgrags pas so //
translated: The to be shown is the essence, by means of proclamation.

original: rigs pa ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: rigs pa ni bzhi ste /
translated: There are four principles:

original: ltos pa'i rigs pa ni rgyu la stos nas 'bras bu skye ba'o //
analyzed: ltos pa'i rigs pa ni rgyu la stos nas 'bras bu skye ba'o //
translated: The principle of dependence is the arising of the effect in dependence on the cause.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rigs pa ni de rnams kyis so sor 'bras bu'i khyad par skyed pas so //üîΩ'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rigs pa ni de rnams kyis so sor 'bras bu'i khyad par skyed pas so // 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pa ni /
translated: The principle of cause and effect is the generation of the particular effect by means of those.

original: tshad ma gang gis don gang sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma gang gis don gang sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The principle of proof is the proof of the object by means of the valid cognition.

original: chos nyid kyi rigs pa ni ngo bo nyid kyis nges pa'i chos rnams te /
analyzed: chos nyid kyi rigs pa ni ngo bo nyid kyis nges pa'i chos rnams te /
translated: The principle of nature is the phenomena that are ascertained by nature.

original: mes sreg par byed la de bzhin chus gsher ba'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mes sreg par byed la de bzhin chus gsher ba'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is like fire burns and water wets, and so on.

original: mngon par 'dod pas lhag par dmigs pa ni dben par skyil mo krung bcas la gus pas rtag tu spyod pa ni sems pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pas lhag par dmigs pa ni dben par skyil mo krung bcas la gus pas rtag tu spyod pa ni sems pa'o //
translated: The to be observed is the special object that is desired, by means of observation. The to be practiced is the constant practice with devotion, by means of the cross-legged posture in solitude.

original: de bzhin nyid la zhig gnas kyi bye brag rnam pa dgus sems mnyam par byed pa ni 'jal ba'o //üîΩchos rnam par 'byed cing rab tu rnam par 'byed /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la zhig gnas kyi bye brag rnam pa dgus sems mnyam par byed pa ni 'jal ba'o // chos rnam par 'byed cing rab tu rnam par 'byed /
translated: The penetration is the equalizing of the mind through the nine distinctions of abiding in suchness.üîΩThe discernment of phenomena is the four aspects of discernment, thorough discernment,

original: yongs su rtog par byed yongs su dpyod par byed par 'gyur zhes pa'i rnam pa bzhis ni lhag mthong ste nges par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su rtog par byed yongs su dpyod par byed par 'gyur zhes pa'i rnam pa bzhis ni lhag mthong ste nges par rtog pa'o //
translated: thorough investigation, and thorough analysis.

original: de la ji tsam du gyur pa nyid kyi shes pa ni rnam par 'byed pa ste /
analyzed: de la ji tsam du gyur pa nyid kyi shes pa ni rnam par 'byed pa ste /
translated: The discernment is the knowledge of just how many there are.

original: phung po lnga po nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga po nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five aggregates, etc.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa nyid kyi shes pas ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ste /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa nyid kyi shes pas ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ste /
translated: The thorough discernment is the knowledge of just what they are.

original: thams cad 'di rnams stong pa nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad 'di rnams stong pa nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All of these are empty, etc.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid kyis shes rab dang lhan cig tu gyur pas mtshan mar byed pa ni yongs su rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid kyis shes rab dang lhan cig tu gyur pas mtshan mar byed pa ni yongs su rtog pa'o //
translated: The thorough investigation is the thorough investigation with the non-conceptual mind that is accompanied by wisdom.üîΩThe thorough analysis is the analysis of the meaning of the words.

original: 'di 'dir ro zhes pas dpyod pa'o zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: 'di 'dir ro zhes pas dpyod pa'o zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: This is the essence of the path of cultivation.

original: de ni rnam pa dgu ste /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa dgu ste /
translated: It is ninefold.üîΩüîΩ

original: chung ngu 'bring dang chen po rnams so /üîΩchung ngu sogs su yang phye bas //
analyzed: chung ngu 'bring dang chen po rnams so / chung ngu sogs su yang phye bas //
translated: There are nine types of weak, medium, and strong.

original: zhes bstan bcos las te /
analyzed: zhes bstan bcos las te /
translated: The treatise Attainment of Knowledge states:üîΩ‚ÄúThe weak, medium, and strong are divided again.‚Äù

original: yang gi sgra ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam pa dgu ste /üîΩchung ngu'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / 'bring gi chung ngu dang / 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam pa dgu ste / chung ngu'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / 'bring gi chung ngu dang / 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúagain‚Äù indicates the nine types of opposing factors.

original: chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i 'bring dang / chen po'i chen po ste /
analyzed: chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i 'bring dang / chen po'i chen po ste /
translated: The weak of the weak, the weak of the medium, the weak of the strong, the medium of the weak, the medium of the medium, the medium of the strong, the strong of the weak, the strong of the medium, and the strong of the strong.

original: 'di rnams kyis lugs las bzlog pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs dgu zad par byed de /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis lugs las bzlog pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs dgu zad par byed de /
translated: These nine types of opposing factors are eliminated in reverse order,

original: chen po'i chen po nas chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar ro //
analyzed: chen po'i chen po nas chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar ro //
translated: from the strong of the strong to the weak of the weak.

original: de yang rnam par rtog pa'i bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon @161a * //
analyzed: de yang rnam par rtog pa'i bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon @161a * //
translated: Moreover, the afflictions that are to be eliminated by the cultivation of the path of seeing are eliminated by the path of cultivation.

original: mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi ji ltar rigs par gos kyi dri ma rags pa sngon du bkrus nas rjes la phra ba 'khru ba de bzhin du sems kyis te /
analyzed: mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi ji ltar rigs par gos kyi dri ma rags pa sngon du bkrus nas rjes la phra ba 'khru ba de bzhin du sems kyis te /
translated: Just as coarse stains on clothing are washed first, and then the subtle stains, so also for the conceptual thoughts of the afflictions.

original: 'di la gsungs pa na de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di la gsungs pa na de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i rim gyis te /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i rim gyis te /
translated: Thus, as explained,

original: sgrub par byed pa ni zhi gnas kyis so //üîΩnye bar sems pa ni lhag mthong gis so //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni zhi gnas kyis so // nye bar sems pa ni lhag mthong gis so //
translated: one practices with ≈õamatha.üîΩOne reflects with vipa≈õyanƒÅ.

original: nye bar rtogs pa ni gnyi gas so //üîΩrab tu sbyor bar byed pa ni zhi gnas kyi brtson 'grus kyis so //
analyzed: nye bar rtogs pa ni gnyi gas so // rab tu sbyor bar byed pa ni zhi gnas kyi brtson 'grus kyis so //
translated: One realizes with both.üîΩOne applies oneself with the effort of ≈õamatha.

original: rtsol bar byed pa ni lhag mthong gi brtson 'grus kyis so //
analyzed: rtsol bar byed pa ni lhag mthong gi brtson 'grus kyis so //
translated: One strives with the effort of vipa≈õyanƒÅ.

original: don du gnyer ba ni gnyi ga'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
analyzed: don du gnyer ba ni gnyi ga'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
translated: One pursues with the effort of both.

original: rab tu dang ba rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rab tu dang ba can du byed pa'i yon tan rnams so //
analyzed: rab tu dang ba rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rab tu dang ba can du byed pa'i yon tan rnams so //
translated: One becomes inspired with the qualities of inspiration.

original: dbang med pa ni mi nus pas so //
analyzed: dbang med pa ni mi nus pas so //
translated: One is powerless without the ability.

original: 'khor ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i rgyun no //
analyzed: 'khor ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i rgyun no //
translated: Samsara is the continuity of future births.

original: bor ba ni btang ba'o //
analyzed: bor ba ni btang ba'o //
translated: Abandoning is letting go.

original: rgyab kyis phyogs pa ni ma 'ongs pa ni mi bgrod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyab kyis phyogs pa ni ma 'ongs pa ni mi bgrod pa'o //
translated: Turning away is not proceeding to the future.

original: 'dor ba ni gtong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dor ba ni gtong ba'o //
translated: Giving up is relinquishing.

original: mthar phyin pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i mtha' dang sngon gyi mtha' sel bas so //
analyzed: mthar phyin pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i mtha' dang sngon gyi mtha' sel bas so //
translated: Reaching the end is eliminating the future end and the past end.

original: bstan pa dang bshad pa zhes pa ni bstan pa dang / bshad pa dag gis bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan pa dang bshad pa zhes pa ni bstan pa dang / bshad pa dag gis bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Teaching and explaining are taught by teaching and explaining.

original: gnas pa ni bsam pas the tshom gcod pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa ni bsam pas the tshom gcod pa'o //
translated: Abiding is the elimination of doubt by intention.

original: slob pa ni zhi gnas kyis so //
analyzed: slob pa ni zhi gnas kyis so //
translated: Training is by serenity.

original: bsgrub pa ni lhag mthong gis so //
analyzed: bsgrub pa ni lhag mthong gis so //
translated: Accomplishment is by insight.

original: nye bar sems pa ni gnyi ga dag gis so //
analyzed: nye bar sems pa ni gnyi ga dag gis so //
translated: Close reflection is by both.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor du byed pa ni sgom pas rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor du byed pa ni sgom pas rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: Thus, making a practice is realizing by cultivation.

original: 'di rnams kyis lan gcig bshad nas gnyis pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis lan gcig bshad nas gnyis pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: Having explained these once, he states a second time:

original: de dag kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Those are also the four kinds of thorough knowledge.

original: spong ngo zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
analyzed: spong ngo zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
translated: Abandoning is the small of the small path of cultivation.

original: rab 'byor de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: As for thus, Subhuti, and so on,

original: khyad par du 'phags pa ni bsod nams mang ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa ni bsod nams mang ba nyid kyis so //
translated: Superior means superior by virtue of the great merit.

original: rab tu 'phags so zhes pa ni chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
analyzed: rab tu 'phags so zhes pa ni chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
translated: Superior means medium of the small.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: As for again, Subhuti, and so on,

original: sbyin par byed pa ni dregs pa med pas so //
analyzed: sbyin par byed pa ni dregs pa med pas so //
translated: Giving means giving without pride.

original: rab tu 'jog par byed pa ni yid la gcags pa med par ro zhes pa ni chung ngu'i chen po'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'jog par byed pa ni yid la gcags pa med par ro zhes pa ni chung ngu'i chen po'o //
translated: Setting up means without regret. This is great of the small.üîΩ As for again, Subhuti, and so on,

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste yid la byed pas gnas zhes pa ni 'bring gi chung ngu'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste yid la byed pas gnas zhes pa ni 'bring gi chung ngu'o //
translated: Attention means abiding. This is small of the medium.üîΩ As for again, Subhuti, and so on,

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni 'bring gi 'bring ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni 'bring gi 'bring ngo //
translated: this is medium of the medium.üîΩ As for again, Subhuti, and so on,üîΩ this is great of the medium.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni 'bring gi chen po'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni 'bring gi chen po'o //
translated: As for again, Subhuti, and so on,üîΩ this is small of the great.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni chen @161b po'i chung ngu'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni chen @161b po'i chung ngu'o //
translated: As for again, Subhuti, and so on,üîΩ this is medium of the great.üîΩ As for again, Subhuti, and so on,üîΩ this is great of the great.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni chen po'i 'bring ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni chen po'i 'bring ngo //
translated: As for again, Subhuti, and so on,üîΩ this is the perfection of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang zhig nang du yang dag 'jog la rnal 'byor du byed pa dang ma bral ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ste /
analyzed: gang zhig nang du yang dag 'jog la rnal 'byor du byed pa dang ma bral ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ste /
translated: One who is not separated from the yoga of correct inner equipoise is in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ni de'i bsgom pa'i lam chen po'i chen po'o //
analyzed: de ni de'i bsgom pa'i lam chen po'i chen po'o //
translated: That is the great of the great path of meditation.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Subh≈´ti said, etc.

original: bsod nams zhes pa ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i yang rnam par rtog pas so //
analyzed: bsod nams zhes pa ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i yang rnam par rtog pas so //
translated: Merit is the formation of merit, and also the conception.

original: 'dir bsgom pa'i lam gyi dus su don dam par med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang / byis pa rnams kyis ma shes pa can gyi stong pa nyid ni ma shes pa nyid du don gcig go //
analyzed: 'dir bsgom pa'i lam gyi dus su don dam par med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang / byis pa rnams kyis ma shes pa can gyi stong pa nyid ni ma shes pa nyid du don gcig go //
translated: Here, at the time of the path of meditation, because of non-existence in the ultimate, emptiness and the emptiness of the ignorance of the childish are synonymous with ignorance.

original: bdag po med pa'i phyir gsog go //
analyzed: bdag po med pa'i phyir gsog go //
translated: Because of ownerlessness, it is hollow.

original: gzung du med pa'i phyir gsob bo //
analyzed: gzung du med pa'i phyir gsob bo //
translated: Because of non-apprehension, it is false.

original: 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir snying po med pa'o //
translated: Because of non-grasping, it is insubstantial.

original: de ltar zhes pa dang stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes pa ni bsod nams 'phel ba la rgol ba'i lan no //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa dang stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes pa ni bsod nams 'phel ba la rgol ba'i lan no //
translated: Thus, etc. and emptiness, etc. are the reply to the objection about the increase of merit.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste bye brag ni tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste bye brag ni tha dad pa'o //
translated: Subhuti said, The distinctions are the differences.

original: gcod pa ni tha dad du byed pa ste ;
analyzed: gcod pa ni tha dad du byed pa ste ;
translated: The divisions are the differentiations.

original: de dag rnam par spyad pa dang don de gnyi ga'i nye bar len pa'o //
analyzed: de dag rnam par spyad pa dang don de gnyi ga'i nye bar len pa'o //
translated: The practices are the two of them, the object and the appropriation.

original: de ltar zhes pa dang / tshad ni rags pa yongs su gcod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa dang / tshad ni rags pa yongs su gcod pa'o //
translated: Thus, the measure is the determination of the gross.

original: grangs ni bgrang bas zad par mi nus pas mi zad pa'o //
analyzed: grangs ni bgrang bas zad par mi nus pas mi zad pa'o //
translated: The number is the inexhaustibility by counting.

original: bla lhag par brjod pa ni bla dags te /
analyzed: bla lhag par brjod pa ni bla dags te /
translated: The indication is the superlative.

original: gtso bo brjod pa'o zhes pa'i don te /üîΩkyang mi zad ces pa ni nam mkha' bzhin no //
analyzed: gtso bo brjod pa'o zhes pa'i don te / kyang mi zad ces pa ni nam mkha' bzhin no //
translated: The expression is the primary.üîΩThe also is inexhaustibility like space.

original: yang gzhal du med pa ni nam mkha' nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: yang gzhal du med pa ni nam mkha' nyid bzhin no //
translated: The immeasurable is like space itself.

original: chos 'di rnams ni mi zad pa dang tshad med pa dang stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnams kyi mngon par brjod pa'i sgras bstan pas so //
analyzed: chos 'di rnams ni mi zad pa dang tshad med pa dang stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnams kyi mngon par brjod pa'i sgras bstan pas so //
translated: These dharmas are taught by the words of expression of the inexhaustibility, the immeasurability, the emptiness, etc.

original: 'di dag gis zhes pa ni thugs rjes bstan pas te de'i mngon par brjod pa ni rgyu mthun pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gis zhes pa ni thugs rjes bstan pas te de'i mngon par brjod pa ni rgyu mthun pa'o //
translated: By these, the teaching by compassion, its expression is the natural outflow.

original: de yang 'dir rgyas par bshad pa ni 'dir bstan bcos las /
analyzed: de yang 'dir rgyas par bshad pa ni 'dir bstan bcos las /
translated: Furthermore, the extensive explanation here is from the treatise:

original: grangs med la sogs bstan pa rnams //
analyzed: grangs med la sogs bstan pa rnams //
translated: The teachings on countless [eons] and so forth

original: dam pa'i don du bzod ma yin //
analyzed: dam pa'i don du bzod ma yin //
translated: are not accepted as ultimate patience.üîΩThe Sage accepts the concordant causes

original: kun rdzob bde dag thugs brtse ba'i //üîΩrgyu mthun gyur pa thub pa bzhed //
analyzed: kun rdzob bde dag thugs brtse ba'i // rgyu mthun gyur pa thub pa bzhed //
translated: of conventional happiness and compassion.

original: ces te / bzod pa ma yin na ni mi rigs zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ces te / bzod pa ma yin na ni mi rigs zhes pa ste /
translated: If they are not accepted as patience, it is unreasonable.

original: brgal ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: brgal ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the objection.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Subh≈´ti said... and so forth.

original: ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir brjod du med pa'o //
translated: Since it is not the domain of speech, it is inexpressible.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gyi zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gyi zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: The meaning of pƒÅramitƒÅ is the characteristic of emptiness.

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las /
translated: Here, in the treatise, it says:

original: brjod du med pa'i dngos po la //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i dngos po la //
translated: In the inexpressible entity,

original: nyams pa dang ni 'phel mi @162a * //
analyzed: nyams pa dang ni 'phel mi @162a * //
translated: diminution and increase are unreasonable.

original: rigs // bsgom zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //
analyzed: rigs // bsgom zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //
translated: By the path called cultivation,

original: ci zhig thob cing ci zhig nyams //
analyzed: ci zhig thob cing ci zhig nyams //
translated: what is obtained and what is diminished?

original: zhes te / rtogs zhes pa'i brjod du med pa la ni nyams pa dang 'phel ba med pas ni ji ltar na byang chub ces pa la sogs pa gsungs pa ni 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes te / rtogs zhes pa'i brjod du med pa la ni nyams pa dang 'phel ba med pas ni ji ltar na byang chub ces pa la sogs pa gsungs pa ni 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The answer is but, etc.

original: des 'di snyam du zhes pa ni gang gis sbyin pa sbyin pas so //
analyzed: des 'di snyam du zhes pa ni gang gis sbyin pa sbyin pas so //
translated: The phrase he thinks thus refers to the one who gives the gift.

original: de dag ces pa ni gang gi sems bskyed pa de rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa rnams kyis so //üîΩnyung du ni yang nas yang du la /
analyzed: de dag ces pa ni gang gi sems bskyed pa de rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa rnams kyis so // nyung du ni yang nas yang du la /
translated: The phrase those refers to those who are endowed with the generation of the thought of enlightenment.

original: mang du ni rgyun du ste /
analyzed: mang du ni rgyun du ste /
translated: The phrase a little refers to the repeated giving of gifts, and a lot refers to the continuous giving of gifts.

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las /
translated: Here, the treatise states:

original: byang chub ji lta de bzhin du //
analyzed: byang chub ji lta de bzhin du //
translated: Just as is enlightenment,

original: de yang 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed //
analyzed: de yang 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed //
translated: so is the accomplishment of the desired aim.

original: byang chub de bzhin nyid mtshan nyid //
analyzed: byang chub de bzhin nyid mtshan nyid //
translated: Enlightenment is characterized by thusness,

original: de yang de yi mtshan nyid bzhed //
analyzed: de yang de yi mtshan nyid bzhed //
translated: and that is accepted as its characteristic.

original: ces te 'di dag dang zhes pa dang / de dang zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: ces te 'di dag dang zhes pa dang / de dang zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam mo //
translated: The phrase these and the phrase that refer to the path of meditation.

original: ji ltar thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bla na med par byang chub pas gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshul gyis kun rdzob tu mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: ji ltar thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bla na med par byang chub pas gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshul gyis kun rdzob tu mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi sgrub pa po'o //
translated: By the power of great compassion, he is the one who accomplishes the aims of those to be trained, in the manner of merit and intuition, conventionally.

original: de ltar bsgom pa'i lam de bzhin nyid kyi sgyu ma lta sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi dag 'grib pa dang 'phel ba'i rim gyis bya ba byed pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar bsgom pa'i lam de bzhin nyid kyi sgyu ma lta sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi dag 'grib pa dang 'phel ba'i rim gyis bya ba byed pa ste /
translated: The path of meditation is the performance of action by the nature of the illusion of suchness, etc., by the process of decrease and increase of the essence of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin spros pa med pa'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi byang chub de ltar de bsgom pa'i lam de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo
analyzed: de bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin spros pa med pa'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi byang chub de ltar de bsgom pa'i lam de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo
translated: The essence of suchness is the nature of illusion, the five aggregates devoid of conceptual elaborations, the essence of the Dharma Body, etc., the enlightenment of the essence of the Tathagata. The path of meditation is the essence of suchness.

original: nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: nyung ba dang mang pas zhes pa ni sbyor ba dang rjes kyi gnas skabs dag la'o //
analyzed: nyung ba dang mang pas zhes pa ni sbyor ba dang rjes kyi gnas skabs dag la'o //
translated: By few and many refers to the periods of preparation and aftermath.

original: dngos po bzhi'i skabs su ni de'i rang bzhin nyid pas gnas pa mi 'thad do //
analyzed: dngos po bzhi'i skabs su ni de'i rang bzhin nyid pas gnas pa mi 'thad do //
translated: In the context of the four things, it is not tenable that it endures because of its very nature.

original: stong pa nyid gtso che ba'i le'u ni stong pa nyid kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: stong pa nyid gtso che ba'i le'u ni stong pa nyid kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o /
translated: The chapter that is preeminent in emptiness is the chapter on emptiness, the eighteenth.

original: // / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni rgol ba la /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni rgol ba la /
translated: Then, etc. is the objection.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa ni lan te /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa ni lan te /
translated: Having said this, etc. is the reply.

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /üîΩsems ni snga mas byang chub bar /
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las / sems ni snga mas byang chub bar /
translated: Here, in the treatise, it says:

original: rigs min phyi mas kyang ma yin //
analyzed: rigs min phyi mas kyang ma yin //
translated: The former mind is not suitable for enlightenment, nor is the latter.

original: mar me'i dpe yi tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: mar me'i dpe yi tshul gyis ni //
translated: By the method of the example of the lamp,

original: zab mo'i chos nyid rnam pa brgyad //üîΩces pa ste /
analyzed: zab mo'i chos nyid rnam pa brgyad // ces pa ste /
translated: the profound reality is eightfold.

original: byang chub ces pa rjes su sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub ces pa rjes su sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This is to be applied to enlightenment.

original: le'u bco brgyad pa la ni byang chub de bzhin nyid 'ba' zhig kho na'i mtshan nyid du gsungs pa yin la /
analyzed: le'u bco brgyad pa la ni byang chub de bzhin nyid 'ba' zhig kho na'i mtshan nyid du gsungs pa yin la /
translated: In the eighteenth chapter, enlightenment is said to have the characteristic of just suchness alone.

original: de 'khor dang bcas @162b pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa brgyad kyis zab pa ste /
analyzed: de 'khor dang bcas @162b pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa brgyad kyis zab pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of enlightenment together with its retinue is profound in eight ways.

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las /
translated: Here, in the treatise, it says:

original: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa dang // de bzhin nyid dang shes bya dang // shes dang spyod dang gnyis med pa //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa dang // de bzhin nyid dang shes bya dang // shes dang spyod dang gnyis med pa //
translated: knowing, conduct, and nonduality,

original: thabs mkhas pa la zab pa nyid //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa la zab pa nyid //
translated: and skill in means are the eight.

original: ces te gnyis su med pa dang thabs la mkhas pa zhes pa ni gnyis so //
analyzed: ces te gnyis su med pa dang thabs la mkhas pa zhes pa ni gnyis so //
translated: Nonduality and skill in means are the two.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa la sogs pas ni zab pa'i go skabs te /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa la sogs pas ni zab pa'i go skabs te /
translated: The passage beginning with Having thus been requested is the opportunity for the profound.

original: gzhan pas zhes pas ni med par ro //
analyzed: gzhan pas zhes pas ni med par ro //
translated: By others is meant nonexistent.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa la sogs pas zab mo rnam pa brgyad gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa la sogs pas zab mo rnam pa brgyad gsungs pa ni /
translated: The passage beginning with Having thus been requested, the Blessed One explains the eight aspects of the profound.

original: sems gang zhes pa ni 'khrul pa la /
analyzed: sems gang zhes pa ni 'khrul pa la /
translated: The passage beginning with What is mind? refers to delusion.

original: 'gag pa ni sgrib pa gnyis po bag chags dang bcas pa'i gnas rgyud la zad pas zad pa'o //
analyzed: 'gag pa ni sgrib pa gnyis po bag chags dang bcas pa'i gnas rgyud la zad pas zad pa'o //
translated: Cessation is the exhaustion of the two obscurations along with their traces in the continuum.

original: ma lag zhes pa ni min pa nyid de /
analyzed: ma lag zhes pa ni min pa nyid de /
translated: The passage beginning with It is not a part means it is not.

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu'i dngos po dang / dngos po med pa la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa spangs pa dang / rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir te snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma dag gis kyang ma yin la de la ma brten pa'i don khyad par du 'phags pa yang skyed du med ces pa la dgongs pa'o zhes pa ni skye ba zab pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu'i dngos po dang / dngos po med pa la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa spangs pa dang / rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir te snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma dag gis kyang ma yin la de la ma brten pa'i don khyad par du 'phags pa yang skyed du med ces pa la dgongs pa'o zhes pa ni skye ba zab pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that it is not produced by the former and later moments, nor is it produced as a special object that does not depend on them.

original: sems gang zhes pa ni ma 'khrul pa las byung ba ni kun rdzob tu ste gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
analyzed: sems gang zhes pa ni ma 'khrul pa las byung ba ni kun rdzob tu ste gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
translated: The mind that is not deluded arises conventionally, like a reflection.

original: 'gag pa'i chos can zhes pa ni 'dri ba ste so sor skad cig re re'i mthar g-yo ba'i chu'i zla ba bzhin du g-yo ba ni kun rdzob tu la /
analyzed: 'gag pa'i chos can zhes pa ni 'dri ba ste so sor skad cig re re'i mthar g-yo ba'i chu'i zla ba bzhin du g-yo ba ni kun rdzob tu la /
translated: The question is whether it has the quality of ceasing. It moves conventionally, like the moon in water, moving at the end of each instant.

original: don dam par ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o zhes pa la dgongs nas gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: don dam par ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o zhes pa la dgongs nas gsungs pa ni /
translated: With the intention that ultimately it is empty of essence, it is said:

original: ma lags zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ma lags zhes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNo, Blessed One.‚Äù

original: lan la 'gag pa'i chos can zhes pa gzhung kha cig las te kun rdzob tu skad cig mas zad ces pa'i don te /
analyzed: lan la 'gag pa'i chos can zhes pa gzhung kha cig las te kun rdzob tu skad cig mas zad ces pa'i don te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúhaving the property of ceasing in response‚Äù is that in some scriptures it is said that ‚Äúthe conventional is exhausted by momentariness.‚Äù

original: kun rdzob tu yang skad cig re res 'gag pa'i chos can te /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu yang skad cig re res 'gag pa'i chos can te /
translated: Even conventionally, it has the property of ceasing in each moment.üîΩIt ceases, because the continuum ceases.

original: 'gag par 'gyur te rgyud 'gags pas so zhes pa la dgongs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang gis skye ba'i snying rje chen pos smon lam btab pa la sogs pa rnams kyis de khyad par du mi zad pa byas pa'i phyir ro zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gag par 'gyur te rgyud 'gags pas so zhes pa la dgongs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang gis skye ba'i snying rje chen pos smon lam btab pa la sogs pa rnams kyis de khyad par du mi zad pa byas pa'i phyir ro zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that by the great compassion that arises by the power of the spontaneously present nature, the prayers and so on are made to be especially inexhaustible.

original: ma skyes zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa la /
analyzed: ma skyes zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúUnarisen‚Äù refers to the future.

original: ma 'gags zhes pa ni dngos po mi 'jug pa'i ngo bo'i phyir rnam par 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'gags zhes pa ni dngos po mi 'jug pa'i ngo bo'i phyir rnam par 'jig pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUnceased‚Äù refers to the disintegration of the entity because it does not engage.üîΩ‚ÄúHaving the property of ceasing‚Äù refers to the continuum being severed.

original: gang 'gags pa'i chos can zhes pas rgyun chad pa ni des ji ltar bskal pa grangs las 'das pa rnams su gang du sems can gyi phung po ma lus pa @163a * //
analyzed: gang 'gags pa'i chos can zhes pas rgyun chad pa ni des ji ltar bskal pa grangs las 'das pa rnams su gang du sems can gyi phung po ma lus pa @163a * //
translated: By that, how is it that in the eons beyond number, wherever the mass of sentient beings is exhausted,

original: rnams sangs rgyas nyid du rdzogs par byed pa la /
analyzed: rnams sangs rgyas nyid du rdzogs par byed pa la /
translated: it is completed in buddhahood?

original: sems can gcig cig kyang rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sems can gcig cig kyang rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is not that even one sentient being will not attain complete enlightenment.

original: med ces pa ni snying rjes chen po dang smon lam dag yul med pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa des na 'gag par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: med ces pa ni snying rjes chen po dang smon lam dag yul med pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa des na 'gag par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Not nonexistent‚Äù means that great compassion and the prayers are not nonexistent, and so they do not cease.

original: min zhes pa ni gdul bya la bsod nams med pas btang snyoms kyi gnas skabs bzhin du /
analyzed: min zhes pa ni gdul bya la bsod nams med pas btang snyoms kyi gnas skabs bzhin du /
translated: ‚Äú Not non-existent‚Äù means that, like the state of equanimity, there is no activity due to the absence of merit in those to be trained.

original: mdzad pa med kyang thugs rje chen po dang smon lam la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs rnam par rtog pa dang ma 'dres par lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang gis 'jug pa'i shin tu rnam par dag pa rtogs pa'i rgyun rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo
analyzed: mdzad pa med kyang thugs rje chen po dang smon lam la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs rnam par rtog pa dang ma 'dres par lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang gis 'jug pa'i shin tu rnam par dag pa rtogs pa'i rgyun rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo
translated: The nature of the conventional for a yogi is the stream of realization of the extremely pure, which is not mixed with conceptual thoughts and is spontaneously present by the power of great compassion, prayers, and so on.

original: ni ji ltar nam mkha' ji srid du 'gag 'gyur ni bshad zin kyang 'dir rigs pa gzhan gyis bshad do //
analyzed: ni ji ltar nam mkha' ji srid du 'gag 'gyur ni bshad zin kyang 'dir rigs pa gzhan gyis bshad do //
translated: It is explained that this is like space, which does not cease as long as the world exists.

original: gang du 'gog pa'i chos can zhes pa'i tshig de'i rnam par bshad pa dang / seng ge bzang po'i bshad pa'i khyad par ni bye brag med dam zhes dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: gang du 'gog pa'i chos can zhes pa'i tshig de'i rnam par bshad pa dang / seng ge bzang po'i bshad pa'i khyad par ni bye brag med dam zhes dpyad par bya'o //
translated: One should analyze whether there is any difference in the explanation of the words ‚Äúhaving the nature of cessation‚Äù and the explanation of Haribhadra.

original: sems gang da ltar byung ba la ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'i chos can zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid med pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: sems gang da ltar byung ba la ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'i chos can zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid med pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
translated: The mind that has arisen in the present has the nature of not being born and not ceasing, because it is essenceless, it is without beginning and end.

original: chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rten mi 'jug pa tsam ni med pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rten mi 'jug pa tsam ni med pa'o //
translated: Dharma is nirvana, and the mere non-functioning of the basis, which is the nature of the five aggregates with obscurations, is non-existence.

original: chos nyid ni stong pa nyid de kun rdzob tu skyes pa ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin 'gag pa'o zhes pa ni 'gag pa zab pa'o //
analyzed: chos nyid ni stong pa nyid de kun rdzob tu skyes pa ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin 'gag pa'o zhes pa ni 'gag pa zab pa'o //
translated: The reality of dharma is emptiness. That which is conventionally arisen is ceased, like an illusory person. This is the profundity of cessation.

original: de nyid la gnas par 'gyur zhes pa ni nam mkha' ji srid bar ro //
analyzed: de nyid la gnas par 'gyur zhes pa ni nam mkha' ji srid bar ro //
translated: One will abide in just that for as long as space exists.

original: gnas na ther zug ma yin pa ni dus gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dam par ngo bo ni de bzhin nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: gnas na ther zug ma yin pa ni dus gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dam par ngo bo ni de bzhin nyid bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it abides, it is not permanent‚Äù means that the ultimate nature of the bodhisattvas of the three times is like suchness.

original: ma lags zhes pa ni kun rdzob pa'i skad cig ma'i gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po'i ngo bo nyid ni rgyun rab tu byung bas brtags pa'i phyir ro zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ma lags zhes pa ni kun rdzob pa'i skad cig ma'i gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po'i ngo bo nyid ni rgyun rab tu byung bas brtags pa'i phyir ro zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not so‚Äù means that the nature of the aggregates of form and so on of the relative is imputed by the arising of a continuum.

original: de bzhin nyid zab po zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po kun tu rtog pa de las tha mi dad pas kyang gting dpag par dka'o zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid zab pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid zab po zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po kun tu rtog pa de las tha mi dad pas kyang gting dpag par dka'o zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid zab pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSuchness is profound‚Äù means that it is difficult to fathom because it is not different from the things of form and so on that are conceptualized.

original: de bzhin nyid la sems zhes pa ni des rig pa'i phyir de'i rten pa ma lags pa ni shes pas tha dad pa'i rig bya la mi sbyor bas so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la sems zhes pa ni des rig pa'i phyir de'i rten pa ma lags pa ni shes pas tha dad pa'i rig bya la mi sbyor bas so //
translated: ‚ÄúSuchness is not the mind‚Äù means that it is not the support of that because it is not connected to the object of cognition that is different from consciousness.

original: sems la de bzhin nyid ces pa ni dbye ba med do zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sems la de bzhin nyid ces pa ni dbye ba med do zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe mind is suchness‚Äù means that there is no division.

original: ma lags zhes pa ni @163b sems dang de bzhin nyid dag don dam par ngo bo nyid med pa dag tu tha dad pa med la /
analyzed: ma lags zhes pa ni @163b sems dang de bzhin nyid dag don dam par ngo bo nyid med pa dag tu tha dad pa med la /
translated: ‚ÄúNo, Blessed One‚Äù means that mind and suchness are not different in being ultimately without an essence.

original: kun rdzob tu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu ni ma yin te /
translated: But they are not the same on the conventional level.

original: rten cing 'brel ba las 'byung ba'i sems nyid la de bzhin nyid ces brjod do //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel ba las 'byung ba'i sems nyid la de bzhin nyid ces brjod do //
translated: The mind itself, which arises in dependence, is called ‚Äúsuchness.‚Äù

original: de bzhin nyid las gzhan du zhes pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid las gzhan du zhes pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúOther than suchness‚Äù means that they are different in their characteristics.

original: ma lags pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa ni ldog pa'i dbye ba tsam gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ma lags pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa ni ldog pa'i dbye ba tsam gyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúNo‚Äù means that they are not different in their characteristics, because they are merely different in terms of their exclusions.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.

original: de nyid la de bzhin nyid du tha mi dad pa dang tha dad pa med par sems kyis shes par bya'i zhes pa ni shes bya zab pa'o //üîΩyang dag par zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid la de bzhin nyid du tha mi dad pa dang tha dad pa med par sems kyis shes par bya'i zhes pa ni shes bya zab pa'o // yang dag par zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it is not non-different‚Äù is the profound object of knowledge.

original: ma lags zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid du de kho na nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ma lags zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid du de kho na nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOne should understand that suchness is not different from that mind, and that it

original: 'di mthong ba med pa nyid mthong ba ni shes pa thab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di mthong ba med pa nyid mthong ba ni shes pa thab pa'o //
translated: The seeing of non-seeing is the seeing of the truth.

original: zab pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la'o //
analyzed: zab pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la'o //
translated: The profound is the object of the perfection of wisdom.

original: yang dag par spyod pa ni dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan la'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spyod pa ni dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan la'o //
translated: The correct practice is the sign of the objective.
